channel.title: Big Applet WTF
channel.description:
My code compiles nicely and is run fine from java.exe. But when I tried running it as an applet I get this from the Java console:
load: ChatClient.class can't be instantiated. java.lang.InstantiationException: ChatClient at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "Thread-29" java.lang.NullPointerException at sun.plugin.util.GrayBoxPainter.showLoadingError(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.showAppletException(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at sun.plugin.util.GrayBoxPainter.showLoadingError(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.showAppletStatus(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
I don't think there's anything wrong with my code, but this is really annoying me. I've spent at least an hour surfing google in search of an answer, but can't find one. Help appreciated; I've attached teh shit I'm using.

item.title: Big Applet WTF
item.dc:creator: @White_Castle White Castle
item.description:
@White_Castle wrote:

[size=40pt]-_-[/size]

I forgot that JFrame was extended instead of Applet. I’m an idiot.

Read full topic

item.title: Big Applet WTF
item.dc:creator: @RegeX RegeX
item.description:
@RegeX wrote:

Erm, you need to make an class for ChatClient that extends Applet, a wrapper for the browser to load.

Read full topic

item.title: Big Applet WTF
item.dc:creator: @White_Castle White Castle
item.description:
@White_Castle wrote:

My code compiles nicely and is run fine from java.exe. But when I tried running it as an applet I get this from the Java console:

load: ChatClient.class can’t be instantiated.
java.lang.InstantiationException: ChatClient
at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Exception in thread “Thread-29” java.lang.NullPointerException
at sun.plugin.util.GrayBoxPainter.showLoadingError(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.showAppletException(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
java.lang.NullPointerException
at sun.plugin.util.GrayBoxPainter.showLoadingError(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.showAppletStatus(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

I don’t think there’s anything wrong with my code, but this is really annoying me. I’ve spent at least an hour surfing google in search of an answer, but can’t find one. Help appreciated; I’ve attached teh shit I’m using.

Read full topic
